item.title: Installing Docker on a Raspberry Pi
item.description: This is an easy step-by-step guide on how to install Docker on your Raspberry Pi. This setup targets Raspbian based Pi’s but should also work on Ubuntu. First make sure your system is up to date sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade Get the installation script and run it curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sudo sh get-docker.sh The last thing left now is to add your pi user (or any other) to the docker group in order to interact with the Docker daemon.
